resources.string: Welcome! Please provide your name (used for sender identification):
Long-press a tag to remove it from the group.
Invalid tag name. Tag names are unique (also among group names), case-insensitive and contain only letters, numbers and underscores.
Invalid tag group name. Tag names are unique (also among tag names), case-insensitive and contain only letters, numbers and underscores.
A tag group cannot be removed while working on it. Move to another group and try again.
An unexpected error occured that prevented the group from being deleted.
